---
title: "Project Overview: Social Media Habits and Attitudes of US Adults"
description: |
   Final project examining social media usage and beliefs of US adults.
---

```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = FALSE)
```

This publicly available data set includes responses from 2000 adults who participated in a phone survey conducted by the Pew Research Center in January 2018. The survey inquired about adult attitudes toward the internet and social media usage. All visualizations are intended for a general audience.
